tileset = "sandcave";
area = "sandcave6";
areaname = "Sandflow Caves";
ambience = null;
dungeon = "sandcave";
A_sprites = [{name:"Save Crystal",model:"o_Crystal",x:33,y:24,walkspeed:-1,conv:"c_healingCrystal"},{name:"Strange Cactus",model:"ch3bosses",x:37,y:17,walkspeed:-2,FRAME:3,elem:"EARTH",BOSSCODE:"CactusKing",conv:[["norm","There\'s something strange about this cactus... For one thing, it has a crown on it. For another thing, it looks like it wants to battle you out of disgruntled malcontentedness! Gasp!"],Do = function()
{
   BATTLE([["KingCuthbert","HappyJohnny","HappyJohnny",null],["King Cuthbert","Happy Johnny","Happy Johnny",null],[20,15,15,null],"TRIO"],"BossBattle",true,true);
   return 1;
}]},{name:"Red Keystone",model:"object",x:15,y:20,type:"switch_orb",colour:"ruby",base:"gold",conv_action:1},{name:"D",model:"area_transition",x:0,y:45,dest:["sandcave3",48,3],ARROW:"W"},{name:"G",model:"area_transition",x:0,y:4,dest:["sandcave5",48,9],ARROW:"W"},{name:"H",model:"area_transition",x:0,y:11,dest:["sandcave5",48,35],ARROW:"W"},{name:"Door",model:"DOOR6",x:45,y:37,dir:"e",dest:["goldfish_ghall",1,11]}];
if(!GameData.plotVars.CH3SQ3[1].Moppo)
{
   A_sprites.push({name:"Reptoid Warrior Moppo",model:"reptoid_warrior",x:8,y:32,walkspeed:40,dir:"n",elem:"EARTH",conv:"c_ch3sq3"});
}
areaLoot = [{x:47,y:2,amount:1,item:"Noxious Bomb"},{x:44,y:5,amount:1,item:"Remedy"},{x:26,y:27,amount:6,item:"BalloonJuice"},{x:34,y:31,amount:1,item:"MoonstoneRing"},{x:10,y:48,amount:2,item:"Ether"},{x:32,y:48,amount:1,item:"Silver Circlet"},{x:21,y:37,amount:1,item:"Sand Fruit",hidden:true}];
